originalText.text: I work with Rukab Brash to handle an array of real estate matters. Ben and has team have been an absolute pleasure to work with. They are diligent, thorough, and creative in their approach. They assisted me with a dispute that I had with my condo board, closing on my property sale and an eviction with a tenant. I enjoy working with their team.

originalText.text:
Ben Brash and his team are extremely professional and a pleasure to work with. He was very accessible to any of my concerns or questions and always responded very quickly. Closing on a house can be very stressful and Ben made things as easy as possible. I would highly recommend him for any real estate matter.. you won’t be disappointed
Susan Streilein

originalText.text: Ben Brash was my lawyer for a condo I bought in Summer of 2022. I would recommend his services to anyone. I was a first time home buyer, and Ben took the time to walk me through every step of the process. He was attentive, detail oriented, and a pleasure to work with!

text.text: Ben Brash was my lawyer for a condo I bought in Summer of 2022. I would recommend his services to anyone. I was a first time home buyer, and Ben took the time to walk me through every step of the process. He was attentive, detail oriented, and a pleasure to work with!

originalText.text:
This law firm is truly incredible. I can personally attest that both Ben and Jack, in particular, are extremely knowledgeable, creative, and kind.

This is absolutely the law firm to have on retainer or help in a real estate or other transaction. I cannot stress enough the competency possessed and unique thoughtfulness that I’m certain are offered to all clients.

originalText.text: Been with Jack & Ben since I opened my business — professional, timely, and always available. Firm helped me with LLC formation and real estate transactions. Highly recommend.
